Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.freehep.xml.util.XMLNodeTraverser
          The design of this class is misguided, it is better to use SAX, and SAXTraverser. Will be removed from future FreeHEP releases 
 

Deprecated Interfaces
org.freehep.application.HasPopupItems
          Use org.freehep.swing.popup.HasPopupItems instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.freehep.util.export.ExportFileType.adjustExtension(File, String, String[])
          use adjustExtension(File, String, String[], String) 
org.freehep.graphicsio.java.JAVAGraphics2D.getColor()
          probably forwards to getClipBounds() 
org.freehep.graphicsio.font.FontUtilities.getEncodedString(String, CharTable)
          use org.freehep.graphics2d.font.FontEncoder.getEncodedString() 
org.freehep.graphicsio.font.FontUtilities.getEncodedString(String, String)
          use org.freehep.graphics2d.font.FontEncoder.getEncodedString() 
hep.aida.ref.plotter.PlotterStyle.infoStyle()
            
org.freehep.util.io.ByteOrderInputStream.readLine()
            
hep.aida.ref.plotter.AxisStyle.setlineStyle(ILineStyle)
          Use setLineStyle instead.
